item.title: Mapping PagedList with AutoMapper
item.description: I’m using an implementation of PagedList based on that given by Rob Conery. I want to convert a paged list of business objects to a paged list of view model objects with AutoMapper. In order for AutoMapper to work in this case, it needs to know how to convert a paged list. This can be done with a custom type converter: public class PagedListConverter : ITypeConverter<PagedList<Person>, PagedList<PersonViewModel>> { public PagedList<PersonViewModel> Convert(ResolutionContext context) { var models = (PagedList<Person>)context.
